host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les instances Azure Database for MySQL via l'API}
{EN: Template to check Azure Database for MySQL resources using API}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Azure Database for MySQL service using API
host_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Database-MySQL

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin Pack pour superviser les ressources Azure Database for MySQL via RestAPI ou AZCLI.**

Modèle d\'hôte disponibles et services associés:

|Cloud-Azure-Database-MySQL-custom|
|---|
|Cpu|
|Memory|
|Queries|
|Traffic|
|Storage|
|Connections|
|Replication|
|Io-consumption|

Ce Plugin Pack fournit un *provider* Host Discovery pour le module d\'auto-découverte d\'Hôtes

**Plugin pack to monitor Azure Database for MySQL resources using RestAPI or AZCLI.**

Available Host template and related Services:

|Cloud-Azure-Database-MySQL-custom|
|---|
|Cpu|
|Memory|
|Queries|
|Traffic|
|Storage|
|Connections|
|Replication|
|Io-consumption|


This Plugin Pack provides a Host discovery *provider* to be used with the Host discovery module.

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module:

* 19.10.1 or later
* 20.04.0 or later
* 20.10.0 or later

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Azure Database for MySQL
